content: प्रकट {%a%} {@--1@} Evident, plain, clear, apparent, manifest. {@--2@} Undisguised, public. {@--3@} Visible. --टं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Clearly, manifestly; evidently. {@--2@} Publicly, openly, undisguisedly ( प्रकटीकृ to manifest, unfold, display; गुह्यं च गूहति गुणान् प्रकटीकरोति <ls>Bh. 2 72</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 31</ls>; प्रकटीभू ‘to become manifest, appear’).
